00001 #define USE_MATH_DEFINES
00002 #include <algorithm>
00003 #include <iostream>
00004 #include <iomanip>
00005 #include <cmath>
00006 #include <cassert>
00007 #include "ps_data.h"
00008 
00009 struct correlation
00010 {
00011   int source;
00012   int target;
00013 };
00014 
00015 bool source_order(const correlation& r1, const correlation& r2)
00016 {
00017   return (r1.source < r2.source || (r1.source == r2.source && r1.target < r2.target));
00018 }
00019 
00020 bool target_order(const correlation& r1, const correlation& r2)
00021 {
00022   return (r1.target < r2.target || (r1.target == r2.target && r1.source < r2.source));
00023 }
00024 
00025 double clamp(double z1, double z2, double z)
00026 {
00027   if (z < z1)
00028     return z1;
00029   if (z > z2)
00030     return z2;
00031   return z;
00032 }
00033 
00034 void compute(int n1, double* x1, double* y1, double* f1, 
00035   int n2, double* x2, double* y2, double* f2,
00036   int m, double d_max, int *t, double* r, double* d)
00037 {
00038   const double r_min = 0.95;
00039   assert(2*m+1 < n1);
00040   assert(2*m+1 < n2);
00041   for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i)
00042   {
00043     t[i] = -1;
00044   }
00045   for (;i < n1-m; ++i)
00046   {
00047     double d_corr, r_corr, d_dist, r_dist;
00048     int j_corr = -1, j_dist = -1;
00049     for (int j = m; j < n2-m; ++j)
00050     {
00051       double d = hypot(x1[i] - x2[j], y1[i] - y2[j]);
00052       if (d > d_max)
00053         continue;
00054 
00055       double f1_avg = 0.0, f2_avg = 0.0;
00056       for (int k = -m; k <= m; ++k)
00057       {
00058         f1_avg += f1[i+k];
00059         f2_avg += f2[j+k];
00060       }
00061       f1_avg /= 2*m;
00062       f2_avg /= 2*m;
00063 
00064       double cov = 0.0, var1 = 0.0, var2 = 0.0;
00065       for (int k = -m; k <= m; ++k)
00066       {
00067         double d1 = f1[i+k] - f1_avg;
00068         double d2 = f2[j+k] - f2_avg;
00069         cov += d1 * d2;
00070         var1 += d1 * d1;
00071         var2 += d2 * d2;
00072       }
00073 
00074       double r = clamp(-1.0, 1.0, cov / sqrt(var1 * var2));
00075       if (j_corr == -1 || (r > r_corr || r == r_corr && d < d_corr))
00076       {
00077         j_corr = j;
00078         r_corr = r;
00079         d_corr = d;
00080       }
00081       if (j_dist == -1 || d < d_dist)
00082       {
00083         j_dist = j;
00084         r_dist = r;
00085         d_dist = d;
00086       }
00087     }
00088     if (r_corr > r_min)
00089     {
00090       r[i] = r_corr;
00091       d[i] = d_corr;
00092       t[i] = j_corr;
00093     }
00094     else
00095     {
00096       t[i] = -1;
00097     }
00098   }
00099   for (; i < n1; ++i)
00100   {
00101     t[i] = -1;
00102   }
00103 }
00104 
00105 int combine(int n1, int* t1, double* r1, double* d1, 
00106   int n2, int* t2, double* r2, double* d2, 
00107   correlation *corr)
00108 {
00109   int total = 0;
00110   for (int i = 0; i < n1; ++i)
00111   {
00112     int j = t1[i];
00113     if (j != -1)
00114     {
00115       corr[total].source = i;
00116       corr[total].target = j;
00117       ++total;
00118     }
00119   }
00120   for (int i = 0; i < n2; ++i)
00121   {
00122     int j = t2[i];
00123     if (j != -1)
00124     {
00125       if (t1[j] != i)
00126       {
00127         corr[total].source = j;
00128         corr[total].target = i;
00129         ++total;
00130       }
00131     }
00132   }
00133 
00134   std::sort(corr, corr+total, target_order);
00135   correlation* append = corr + total;
00136   for (int i = 1; i < total; ++i)
00137   {
00138     int ds = corr[i].source - corr[i-1].source;
00139     if (ds > 1)
00140     {
00141       int dt = corr[i].target - corr[i-1].target;
00142       for (int j = 1; j < ds; ++j)
00143       {
00144         append->source = corr[i-1].source + j;
00145         append->target = corr[i-1].target + int(0.5 + dt * j / ds);
00146         ++append;
00147       }
00148     }
00149   }
00150   total = append - corr;
00151   
00152   std::sort(corr, corr+total, source_order);
00153   append = corr + total;
00154   for (int i = 1; i < total; ++i)
00155   {
00156     int dt = corr[i].target - corr[i-1].target;
00157     if (dt > 1)
00158     {
00159       int ds = corr[i].source - corr[i-1].source;
00160       for (int j = 1; j < dt; ++j)
00161       {
00162         append->target = corr[i-1].target + j;
00163         append->source = corr[i-1].source + int(0.5 + ds * j / dt);
00164         ++append;
00165       }
00166     }
00167   }
00168   total = append - corr;
00169   return total;
00170 }

00172 void iter(psstream& out, int m)
00173 {
00174   out.newpage();
00175   out.setfont(FONT_33, 6.0);
00176 
00177   out.setlinewidth(1.0);
00178   out.setgray(0.0);
00179 
00180   const int n = 201;
00181   double x1[n], y1[n], f1[n];
00182   double x0 = 20.0; // абсцисса начальной точки
00183   double dx = 4.0; // шаг вдоль профиля
00184   double T = 40.0; // период функции
00185   double y0 = 100.0; // ордината начальной точки
00186   double df = 40.0; // амплитуда сигнала
00187   double phi = 0.0; // начальная фаза
00188   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00189   {
00190     x1[i] = x0 + dx * i;
00191     y1[i] = y0;
00192     f1[i] = 0.5 * df * (1.0 + sin(phi + 2.0 * M_PI * i / T));
00193     out.moveto(x1[i], y1[i]);
00194     out.lineto(x1[i], y1[i] - f1[i]);
00195     out.stroke();
00196     if (i % 10 == 0)
00197     {
00198       double bb[4];
00199       char text[20];
00200       sprintf(text, "%d", i);
00201       label(out, x1[i], y1[i], 1.0, LABEL_N, true, text, bb);
00202     }
00203   }
00204 
00205   double x2[n], y2[n], f2[n];
00206   T = 32.0; // период функции
00207   y0 = 200.0; // ордината начальной точки
00208   df = 30.0; // амплитуда сигнала
00209   phi = 2 * M_PI * 3 / T; // начальная фаза
00210   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00211   {
00212     x2[i] = x0 + dx * i;
00213     y2[i] = y0;
00214     f2[i] = 0.5 * df * (1.0 + sin(phi + 2.0 * M_PI * i / T));
00215     out.moveto(x2[i], y2[i]);
00216     out.lineto(x2[i], y2[i] + f2[i]);
00217     out.stroke();
00218     if (i % 10 == 0)
00219     {
00220       double bb[4];
00221       char text[20];
00222       sprintf(text, "%d", i);
00223       label(out, x2[i], y2[i], 1.0, LABEL_S, true, text, bb);
00224     }
00225   }
00226 
00227   int t1[n], t2[n];
00228   correlation corr[n+n];
00229   double r1[n], d1[n], r2[n], d2[n];
00230   compute(n, x1, y1, f1, n, x2, y2, f2, m, 110.0, t1, r1, d1);
00231   compute(n, x2, y2, f2, n, x1, y1, f1, m, 110.0, t2, r2, d2);
00232   int nn = combine(n, t1, r1, d1, n, t2, r2, d2, corr);
00233 
00234   out.setlinewidth(0.0);
00235   for (int i = 0; i < nn; ++i)
00236   {
00237     int s = corr[i].source;
00238     int t = corr[i].target;
00239     out.moveto(x1[s], y1[s]);
00240     out.lineto(x2[t], y2[t]);
00241   }
00242   out.stroke();
00243 
00244   /*
00245   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00246   {
00247     if (t1[i] == -1)
00248       continue;
00249 
00250     int j = t1[i];
00251     out.moveto(x1[i], y1[i]);
00252     out.lineto(x2[j], y2[j]);
00253     out.stroke();
00254   }
00255   */
00256 
00257   out.setrgbcolor(1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00258   int num_points = 0;
00259   int num_segments = 0;
00260   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00261   {
00262     if (t1[i] == -1)
00263     {
00264       if (num_points == 1)
00265       {
00266         out.lineto(x1[i-1], y1[i-1] * 100.0 * r1[i-1]);
00267       }
00268       num_points = 0;
00269       continue;
00270     }
00271 
00272     if (num_points > 0)
00273     {
00274       out.lineto(x1[i], y1[i] + 100.0 * r1[i]);
00275     }
00276     else
00277     {
00278       out.moveto(x1[i], y1[i] + 100.0 * r1[i]);
00279       ++num_segments;
00280     }
00281     ++num_points;
00282   }
00283   if (num_segments > 0)
00284   {
00285     out.stroke();
00286   }
00287   
00288   out.setlinewidth(1.0);
00289   out.setgray(0.0);
00290 
00291   y0 = 300.0; // ордината начальной точки
00292   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00293   {
00294     y1[i] = y0;
00295     out.moveto(x1[i], y1[i]);
00296     out.lineto(x1[i], y1[i] - f1[i]);
00297     out.stroke();
00298     if (i % 10 == 0)
00299     {
00300       double bb[4];
00301       char text[20];
00302       sprintf(text, "%d", i);
00303       label(out, x1[i], y1[i], 1.0, LABEL_N, true, text, bb);
00304     }
00305   }
00306 
00307   y0 = 400.0; // ордината начальной точки
00308   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00309   {
00310     y2[i] = y0;
00311     out.moveto(x2[i], y2[i]);
00312     out.lineto(x2[i], y2[i] + f2[i]);
00313     out.stroke();
00314     if (i % 10 == 0)
00315     {
00316       double bb[4];
00317       char text[20];
00318       sprintf(text, "%d", i);
00319       label(out, x2[i], y2[i], 1.0, LABEL_S, true, text, bb);
00320     }
00321   }
00322 
00323   out.setlinewidth(0.0);
00324   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00325   {
00326     if (t2[i] == -1)
00327       continue;
00328 
00329     int j = t2[i];
00330     out.moveto(x2[i], y2[i]);
00331     out.lineto(x1[j], y1[j]);
00332     out.stroke();
00333   }
00334 
00335   out.setrgbcolor(1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00336   num_points = 0;
00337   num_segments = 0;
00338   for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00339   {
00340     if (t2[i] == -1)
00341     {
00342       if (num_points == 1)
00343       {
00344         out.lineto(x1[i-1], y1[i-1] * 100.0 * r2[i-1]);
00345       }
00346       num_points = 0;
00347       continue;
00348     }
00349 
00350     if (num_points > 0)
00351     {
00352       out.lineto(x2[i], y1[i] + 100.0 * r2[i]);
00353     }
00354     else
00355     {
00356       out.moveto(x2[i], y1[i] + 100.0 * r2[i]);
00357       ++num_segments;
00358     }
00359     ++num_points;
00360   }
00361   if (num_segments > 0)
00362   {
00363     out.stroke();
00364   }
00365 
00366   {
00367     double bb[4];
00368     char text[20];
00369     sprintf(text, "%d", m);
00370     out.setfont(FONT_33, 32.0);
00371     out.setgray(0.0);
00372     label(out, out.pagewidth()-50.0, out.pageheight()-50.0, \
00373       1.0, LABEL_SE, true, text, bb);
00374   }
00375 }

00377 void main(int argc, char** argv)
00378 {
00379   psstream out("CON:");
00380   out.selectmedia(psstream::FORMAT_A4, psstream::LANDSCAPE);
00381 
00382   int m = 5;
00383   if (argc > 1)
00384   {
00385     m = atoi(argv[1]);
00386   }
00387   iter(out, m);
00388 }
